thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 7 of 1736
thread.title: Deborah

author: Deborah
title: Deborah
text:
I can honestly say that I have been able to find the best prices for the best flights and I have always had good experiences with my flights. If my flight has been delayed I have always received proper notice and updates given to me asap.
One flight got cancelled and I was put up in a complimentary room which was at a top notch hotel and I appreciated it very much. I would recommend flight hub to my friends and family. Like I said Great Prices for Great Flights!!!
